mapper.insert: insert into singo(singo_writer, singo_reason, singo_content, singo_date, singo_image, singo_pisingoja) values(#{singoWriter}, #{singoReason}, #{singoContent}, now(), #{singoImage}, #{singoPisingoja})
mapper.select: select member_name from member where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member right outer join singo on member_id = singo_pisingoja set member_warning = member_warning + 1 , singo_yn = 'Y' where singo_num = #{singoNum};
mapper.select: select * from member right outer join singo on member_id = singo_pisingoja where singo_yn = 'N' order by singo_date desc
mapper.delete: delete member, singo from member right join singo on member.member_id = singo.singo_pisingoja where singo_num = #{singoNum} and member_warning >= 5
